text: wama 'arsalna qablak - 'ayuha alrasul - ahdana min rusulina 'iilaa kanuu bshrana, yakulun alteam, wayamshun fi alaswaq. wajaealna bedkm- 'ayuha alnas- libaed abtla' wakhtbarana balhda waldlal, walghna walfqr, walsihat walmrd, hal tsbrwn, ftqwmu bima awjbh allah elykm, wtshkru lh, fythybkm mwlakm, 'aw la tsbrwn ftsthqu aleqwb? wakan rabuk - 'ayuha alrasul - bsyrana biman yjze 'aw ysbr, wabiman yakfur 'aw yshkr
